markdownRemark.html:
More details about the CFP can be found here: PyOhio Call For Proposals

When you're ready to submit a proposal:

  • go to cfp.pyohio.org
  • create an account (or login if you created an account last year)
  • Update your speaker profile
  • Submit talk/tutorial proposal

For more information on how we select talks see our selection process.

We also need help reviewing proposals! If you'd like to help see our sign-up instructions.

frontmatter.title: PyOhio CFP Open!
frontmatter.description: The PyOhio CFP is open now through May 12!
